body:
I don't want locking. I don't care about duplicate processes. I just want to make sure the backups that I want to send are finished before I send them, and there's no sentinel I can check for.

-Mat

> On Jul 7, 2016, at 13:50, Brian Bockelman notifications@github.com wrote:
> 
> Hi guys,
> 
> Why not toss all the process-existence code and replace it with an invocation of flock?
> 
> Brian
> 
> —
